mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUYER (BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, EMAIL, COUNTRY, CATEGORY, BUSINESS, ITEMS, ORDER_AMOUNT) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD.nextval, #{buyer_name}, #{email}, #{country}, #{category}, #{business}, #{items}, #{order_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, EMAIL, COUNTRY, CATEGORY, BUSINESS, ITEMS, ORDER_AMOUNT, REGDATE FROM BUYER WHERE BUYER_ID > 0 ORDER BY BUYER_ID DESC

WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY BUYER_ID DESC, REGDATE DESC
